screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .dxf file in Autodesk AutoCAD 2023
screenshot.caption: DXF file open in Autodesk AutoCAD 2023

description: Autodesk developed the DXF format as a universal format so that more applications could open AutoCAD documents. For example, you can export 3D models as DXF files with the Valve Hammer Editor, then open and edit them with other 3D modeling applications, such as Autodesk AutoCAD or ACD Systems Canvas.

The steps for creating a DXF file differ depending on each CAD application. For example, to create a DXF file with AutoCAD, select File â†’ Save As... , then choose the DXF format from the dropdown menu.
